page.title: 16A Small Dundrennan Farm
page.content: Barend is a small family farm consisting of 12 fields.It has 2 fields of barley and 3 of hay.The rest of the fields are rough grazing.It is half and half livestock.One cow is usually milked but sometimes when the cow is low a Guernsey is milked as well.There are about 12 cows in the byre. Due to a shortage of grass,some cattle are still being fed and some are still inside. At the moment all the work is done by the farmer,his wife,his son and his daughter.The farmer works from 7.00 a.m. to 8.30 p.m.The others vary. Before breakfast he milks the cows and feeds the calves.After that he goes to the sheep and then he goes spraying.After spraying he powerhoses the byre.He then does the cows again.
